content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone mine at position(-46.0, 0.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position -46.0, 0.0) 
- Wooden chest (position -45.5, 1.5)

### Copper ore mine at position(-46.0, 71.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position -46.0, 71.0) 
- Wooden chest (position -45.5, 72.5) to catch copper ore
- Stone furnace (position -47.0, 73.0) to smelt copper ore into copper plates

### Iron plate factory at position(16.0, 71.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position 16.0, 71.0) to mine iron ore
- Wooden chest (position 16.5, 72.5) to catch iron ore
- Stone furnace (position 17.0, 74.0) to smelt iron ore into iron plates

### Electricity generator at position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of 
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5)
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, -2.5)
- Boiler and steam engine (not explicitly mentioned but part of the pipe group)
- Pipe group connecting offshore pumps to boiler (position -8.5, -0.5 and others)
- Pipe group connecting boiler to steam engine (position 10.5, -1.5 and others)

### Electricity network
Consists of 
- Electricity group (id=42150) with poles at various positions

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities that are too far apart
- Ensure that entities are positioned close enough to be connected.

### Errors when placing entities into occupied positions
- Ensure that the target position is clear of other entities before attempting to place entities.

### Errors when getting entities that do not exist
- Ensure that the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to get it.

### Errors when finding nearest entities that do not exist
- Ensure that the entity type exists on the surface before attempting to find the nearest one.

### Errors when extracting items from empty entities
- Ensure that the entity contains the required items before attempting to extract them.

### Errors when getting entities from an empty list
- Ensure that the list of entities is not empty before attempting to access its elements.

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Ensure that you move to the target position before attempting to place entities.

### Errors when crafting items with missing sub-ingredients
- Ensure that you have the required sub-ingredients in your inventory or have a setup to craft them.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.

### Errors when extracting items from entities that are not ready
- Ensure that the entity has finished its production cycle before attempting to extract items.

### Errors when accessing non-existent chests or furnaces
- Ensure that the chest or furnace exists at the specified position before attempting to access it.

### Errors when offshore pumps are not connected
- Ensure that offshore pumps are properly connected to other entities.

### Errors when furnaces are out of fuel or ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have the required fuel and ingredients to operate.

### Errors when chests are full
- Ensure that chests are emptied regularly to avoid overflow.

## NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent were found in the provided logs.
